choices.C: It orchestrates connectivity between WAN Edge routers using policies to create network topology.
choices.D: It uses TLOCs to uniquely identify the circuit interface to control plane and data plane information.
choices.E: It builds control plane connections with WAN Edge routers using TLS or DTLS.
choices.B: It validates that the WAN Edge trying to join the overlay is authorized to join.
choices.A: It ensures that valid WAN Edge routers can build the control plane connectivity.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CE
I think it is CE based on this cisco page
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/solutions/CVD/SDWAN/cisco-sdwan-design-guide.html

Selected Answer: CE
C and E are OK

Selected Answer: CE
The answer must be C and E !!
I would say that the answer is B & E.

questions.question_text: A WAN Edge device has several service VPNs with no routing protocol configured in the service VPNs. The device must be configured so that all connected routes are visible in OMP for VPN 10. Which configuration meets the requirement?

discussion.content: I agree with answer D. Advertise connected

To restore the method used to calculate summary route costs per RFC 1583, use the compatible rfc1583 in router configuration mode. Hence Option D is correct
